t: Psalm 135
Praise to God in Creation and Redemption
Praise*pn the Lord!*s Praise*ln the name of the Lord;*s Praise*ld Him,*i O you servants of the Lord!*s
You*ld who stand in the house of the Lord,*s In*ld the courts of the house of our God,
Praise*ld the Lord,*s for the Lord*s is*i good; Sing*ld praises to His name, for it*i is*i pleasant.
For*ld the Lord*s has chosen Jacob for Himself, Israel*ld for His special treasure.
For*ln I know that the Lord*s is*i great, And*ld our Lord is*i above all gods.
Whatever*ld the Lord*s pleases He does, In*ld heaven and in earth, In*ld the seas and in all deep places.
He*ld causes the vapors to ascend from the ends of the earth; He*ld makes lightning for the rain; He*ld brings the wind out of His treasuries.
He*ln destroyed the firstborn of Egypt, Both*ld of man and beast.
He*ld sent signs and wonders into the midst of you, O Egypt, Upon*ld Pharaoh and all his servants.
He*ld defeated many nations And*ld slew mighty kings—
Sihon*ld king of the Amorites, Og*ld king of Bashan, And*ld all the kingdoms of Canaan—
And*ld gave their land as*i a heritage, A*ld heritage to Israel His people.
Your*ln name, O Lord,*s endures*i forever, Your*ld fame, O Lord,*s throughout all generations.
For*ld the Lord*s will judge His people, And*ld He will have compassion on His servants.
The*ln idols of the nations are*i silver and gold, The*ld work of men’s hands.
They*ld have mouths, but they do not speak; Eyes*ld they have, but they do not see;
They*ld have ears, but they do not hear; Nor*ld is there any*i breath in their mouths.
Those*ld who make them are like them; So*ild is*i everyone who trusts in them.
Bless*ln the Lord,*s O house of Israel! Bless*ld the Lord,*s O house of Aaron!
Bless*ld the Lord,*s O house of Levi! You*ld who fear the Lord,*s bless the Lord!*s
Blessed*ld be the Lord*s out of Zion, Who*ld dwells in Jerusalem! Praise*ln the Lord!*s
